title: Poetry for an Englishman
brief_description: A young girl, living with her family in a lighthouse, is fascinated by her brother’s aloofness and observes his relationship with an English sailor from a distance. Based on a short story, “My brother writes poetry for an Englishman” by Marris Murray. Cast includes Georgina Bradley (Janie), Nathan Dutton (brother), Anna Volska (mother) and John Sheerin (father).
